title: As Iraq Comes Apart At The Seams, Washington Weighs What To Do
teaser: Grave questions face the Iraqi government, and U.S. officials are scrambling to decide what to do. The U.S. helped shape the country; is there anything it can — or would — do to keep it together?
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
